Reviews.Title: Mechanical problems
Reviews.Author: TangSooDo
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for about a year.  It now randomly shuts off and reboots.  It also sometimes has a hard time finding a signal in places I absolutely know a good signal exists.  I had a Motorola Razor for 6 years with no problems.  Our phones should not start breaking after a year, it's unacceptable.  As a result, I will never by a Samsung phone ever again.

Reviews.Title: Liked this phone
Reviews.Author: Mary Carr
Reviews.Content: I picked this phone for my husband because I already have one and was very satisfied with it.  We just wanted another simplephone for our basic phone plan. It is easy to use and has a qwerty keyboard. It has different features and it is made well. It also has the reliable name of Samsung. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a basic phone with no fancy phone plans.

Reviews.Title: does the job for me!
Reviews.Author: Jenny Barringer "Suns Fan"
Reviews.Content: you get what you pay for, I do not use my phone often  for talking but text quite a bit. This phone is fine, also it is a good starter phone for a child and I had previously sent my 10 year old grand daugher the same phone . This is my second Gravity and this new one seems to have stiffer keys when I text. It does not text as easily as my previous, but again, it is fine and for the price it is as expected. I would recommend it to somebody who is not into high tech gadgets :)

Reviews.Title: Seller good, Phone So So
Reviews.Author: Lucy Soldwedel
Reviews.Content: A definite step down from my former phone (LG UX9100) Fairly good battery Life. Very poor speaker, trouble storing photos to SD card, Keyboard is too small.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: David S. Dorsey
Reviews.Content: Worked perfect out of the box. This phone meets all expectations. We continue to use this phone with full satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: Total waste
Reviews.Author: J. A. Veizaga
Reviews.Content: This basic phone has a major issue: it turns off by itself and can be unresponsive. DO NOT GET THIS PHONE! The only good thing about it is that it makes good quality sound phone calls.

Reviews.Title: no good
Reviews.Author: Theressa Lopez
Reviews.Content: Didnt like quality of fone seems like cheapy I think the picture makes it look kool but u get it n the phone suxz

Reviews.Title: already told this story
Reviews.Author: leonard  Sevier
Reviews.Content: very very very nice new phone great..quick to come..still very very unhappy I had to pay return postage on the last order ..it was not as said excellent condition..memorie slot totally unusable..not as adverted.........principle..they lied..i PAYED..Need some changes in this area for everyone..they lided they should pay not me.......
